export default class RSS{constructor(options){this.options=void 0;this.items=void 0;this.options=options;this.items=[];}addItem(item){this.items.push(item);}createXML(){let xml="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rss version="2.0">
<channel>
";xml+=this.createTag("title",this.options.title)+this.createTag("link",this.options.url)+this.createTag("description",this.options.description)+this.createTag("language",this.options.language)+this.createTag("copyright",this.options.copyright);this.items.forEach(item=>{xml+=this.createItem(item);});xml+="</channel>
</rss>";return xml;}createItem(item){let rssItem="<item>
";rssItem+=this.createTag("title",item.title)+this.createTag("link",item.url)+this.createTag("description",item.description)+this.createTag("author",item.author)+this.createTag("guid",item.guid)+this.createTag("pubDate",item.date);rssItem+="<enclosure url="".concat(item.imageUrl,"" length="0" type="image/jpg"/>");item.categories.forEach(category=>{rssItem+=this.createTag("category",category);});rssItem+="</item>
";return rssItem;}createTag(tag,content){return"<".concat(tag,">").concat(content,"</").concat(tag,">
");}}
